name: Axis Lost
description:
You are a scientist trapped in a desolate research station deep in space with a gravity and space-altering alien artifact. Every time you try to leave, the artifact twists space, putting you back into the lab. You need to find a way to escape the facility or you will be trapped in the lab until you die. 

Made by: Ethan Herrera, Fiona Hsu, Jake Indgin, Yuanzheng “Steven” Ji, Jonathan “Jonty” Lewis, Daniel Olaes, Thomas Price, Will Tate
